summary: E-vehicle charging time slot booking system
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Electric vehicle charging station illustration with modern design (ev-station.dim_800x600.png)
- Green energy icon representing eco-friendly charging (eco-icon.dim_128x128.png)

existing_features.title: Build a frontend interface to display a list of charging stations with their details and real-time availability
Implement a calendar or time picker interface for users to select their desired charging date and time slot
Create a booking confirmation flow where users can review their selection and complete the reservation
Implement user authentication using Internet Identity to manage bookings per user
Create a user dashboard showing all current and upcoming bookings for the logged-in user
Add functionality for users to cancel their bookings at least 1 hour before the scheduled time

Design a modern, clean interface with a cohesive color scheme using green and electric blue accents to reflect the eco-friendly nature of electric vehicles, with clear typography and intuitive layouts for browsing stations and booking slots

new_feature_requests.summary: E-vehicle charging time slot booking functionality
Create a backend data model for charging stations with properties: station ID, station name, location, number of charging ports, and operating hours
Implement a time slot booking system where users can reserve charging slots in 30-minute increments
Create backend functions to check available time slots for a given station and date range
